title: Vegacy
typeOfFood: Vegan, Pizza, Western, Buffet, Fast food, Brazilian
description: Cozinha vegetariana. Pay for all-you-can eat or per kilo buffet weekdays during daytime, a la carte in the evenings, and Saturday is all-you-can eat. Also has veg burgers from $R10, salgados vegan snacks from R$3, plus you can also get dessert and cake. Previously located in a different location on Rua Augusta. Confirmed open Dec 2013.
